Title: Enemy of the State
Overview: When the videotape of the murder of a congressman unknowingly ends up in the hands of labor lawyer and dedicated family man Robert Clayton Dean, he is framed for the murder. With the help of the mysterious Brill, Dean attempts to throw the NSA off his trail and prove his innocence.
Tagline: It's not paranoia if they're really after you.
Keywords: corruption, washington d.c., helicopter, falsely accused, identity, mexican standoff, blackmail, intelligence, wiretap, satellite, national security agency (nsa), politics, exploding building, suspense, mystery, mafia, conspiracy, lawyer, crime, privacy, surveillance, baltimore maryland, secret hideout
production_companies: Jerry Bruckheimer Films, Scott Free Productions, Touchstone Pictures, No Such Productions
Cast: Will Smith, Gene Hackman, Jon Voight
